definitions.definition: The sterile parts of a flower ; collectively, the sepals and petals (or tepals ).
The sterile, tubelike tissue that surrounds the female reproductive structure in a leafy liverwort .

main_definition: ( botany ) The sterile parts of a flower ; collectively, the sepals and petals (or tepals ).
secondary_definitions: ( botany , bryology ) The sterile, tubelike tissue that surrounds the female reproductive structure in a leafy liverwort .
